customProperties.armorEffects: Your Constitution Score is lowered by 2 while wearing this armor, but you gain proficiency in Constitution Saving Throws.
customProperties.weaponEffects: If this weapon is coated in a Poison, the Poison's DC is increased by 2.
customProperties.additionalEffects: A character can use Putrid Lead Glassblowers tools when crafting potions and poisons to gain a +1 bonus on the Alchemists tools or Poisoners check, this does not require you to actively use the tool but you must still have proficiency and have them on your person.

entries.name: Properties
entries: Armor Effects: Your Constitution Score is lowered by 2 while wearing this armor, but you gain proficiency in Constitution Saving Throws.
Weapon Effects: If this weapon is coated in a Poison, the Poison's DC is increased by 2.

Additional Effects: A character can use Putrid Lead Glassblowers tools when crafting potions and poisons to gain a +1 bonus on the Alchemists tools or Poisoners check, this does not require you to actively use the tool but you must still have proficiency and have them on your person.
